title: Four Corners
credit_line: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Edward N. Haskell
provenance_text:
Bernard Cohen [1933-], London, England. Waddington Galleries Ltd, London, England, by November 1981 until January 1982; Mr. [1920-1988] and Mrs. [1923-2013] Edward N. Haskell, Pittsburgh, PA, January 1982 until December 6, 1984; gift to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, December 1984.

Notes:
[1]. Purchased by the Haskells through the intermediary of the museum’s then director John R. Lane. The invoice from the gallery, which was forwarded to the Haskells, shows a price of £3,600 (£4,000 less 10% discount).  The work was loaned to the museum in September 1982 to be exhibited in conjunction with the 1982 Carnegie International.
